lines.chord: G     Em    D  G  C          G
lines.lyrics: Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!

lines.chord: D            Em  D   G   D          A       D
lines.lyrics: Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;

lines.chord: G     Em    D G   C            G
lines.lyrics: Holy, holy, holy! Merciful and mighty!

lines.chord: Em  G        C  Em    C       D    G
lines.lyrics: God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!

lines.chord: G     Em    D  G  C               G
lines.lyrics: Holy, holy, holy! All the saints adore Thee,

lines.chord: D                  Em     D      G    D     A      D
lines.lyrics: Casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea;

lines.chord: G    Em      D    G   C              G
lines.lyrics: Cherubim and seraphim falling down before Thee,

lines.chord: Em    G        C   Em  C   D          G
lines.lyrics: Which wert and art and evermore shalt be.

lines.chord: G     Em    D  G  C                   G
lines.lyrics: Holy, holy, holy! Though the darkness hide Thee,

lines.chord: D                 Em     D   G   D     A       D
lines.lyrics: Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see,

lines.chord: G    Em       D G   C               G
lines.lyrics: Only Thou art holy; there is none beside Thee,

lines.chord: Em    G    C      Em C         D     G
lines.lyrics: Perfect in pow'r, in love, and purity.

lines.chord: G     Em    D  G  C          G
lines.lyrics: Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!

lines.chord: D                   Em         D     G  D          A        D
lines.lyrics: All thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth, and sky, and sea;

lines.chord: G     Em    D G   C            G
lines.lyrics: Holy, holy, holy! Merciful and mighty!

lines.chord: Em  G        C  Em    C       D   G
lines.lyrics: God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!
